Reviews.Title: “Living Nightmare”
Reviews.Author: got_krabs
Reviews.Content: This Place Is Terrible everything was good until i had rude awakening. Sometime around 4 in the morning i heard sounds of sexual intercouse. Also my toilet pipe blew and fecal matter was all over half of my room. The manager was nice enough to send a plumber to my room, and we soon found out the problem was there was a dead rat along with a few used condums That was Cloging the toilet. There was bullet holes in my wall, and in the middle of the night a african man threw a cinder block at my window. Walked into my room and asked for his XXX DVD's. I had know idea what he was talkin about??? He then kicked a hole through the wall and pulled out his XXX and then walked out. Police did show up looking for this man, and said we is wanted. I also belive he may have been smoking weed. I will never come within 50 miles of this place ever again. WORST NIGHT OF MY LIFE!!!

Reviews.Title: “Lies and terrible service!”
Reviews.Author: Indycarcar
Reviews.Content: I stayed there a few times and was given different reasons why the price was higher than the advertised price. (the race, the weekend starts on friday, smoking rooms are cheaper). It was also dirty and smelly on each occassion - NEVER AGAIN!

Reviews.Title: “2180 n state street local. greenfield Ind. SUCKS!”
Reviews.Author: roadking02667
Reviews.Content: My fiance and I stayed there for ONE night. We were there not even 2 hours and my fiance was being bitten by bed bugs! We tried to get our money back to leave and go to a clean motel! And we were called liars and refused any type of refund. I would stay clear of this place! Corporate office should close this location down! if not the board of health!

Reviews.Title: “its hell to stay there, oh my god, too dirty, no one cleans the room, someone use already the rooms dont stay there!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: gaga8
Reviews.Content: we were there yesterday feb 21, 2011 very horrible experience too dirty, and smell, just like someone use already there bedsheet, i want to call the attention of the sanitary government there at indianapolis please check there sanitary permit, this was very horrible to stay there, thats why early in the morning we are rushing to pack up im with our kids and with my husband, i repeat i call the attention to the sanitary government there please close that immediately i rate this negative and negative 00000000000000000000000000

Reviews.Title: “Dollar Inn - Worst Place Ever”
Reviews.Author: JCIL87
Reviews.Content: I traveled to Indiana and was planning to stay 4 days in town. Could not find a good hotel decided to stay at Dollar Inn after driving all night long and all day. The good hotels were far from where I was going to visit. I paid the 4 days I would be in town. I really didn't want to stay at this hotel. Just by looking at it from the outside gave me the creeps. The room I was given was in the back. When I entered the room it looked bad. The furniture was old and dirty. The carpet was dirty. The bed looked dirty. The sheets were bad. Stains everywhere. The shower was dirty. The lock on the door didn't even lock and it had a cheap chain to lock it. When I saw the room I actually wanted to leave infact I wanted to back home to Texas. I didn't sleep all night long thinking someone was going to break in. I put a chair under the door knob because the door did not lock. This hotel looked like the hotels in a thriller movie. I will never ever stay there again. Even though I paid the 4 days. I was lucky and got my refund back and paid only one night. There is a Motel 6 across the street. I went there. And the rooms were better and cleaner. Clean sheets and towels. The tub was not too great but it sure did beat the Dollar Inn. And Motel 6 uses cards to open rooms and once you close the door inside it has a bolt lock. Sure made me feel safer. I stayed the next 3 days at Motel 6 and was happier. Even the people at the front desk were nice. Do not stay at the Dollar INN. It is nasty!!!!!!!!! I wish I would have taken pictures.

Reviews.Title: “Not a good place for your girlfriend, I'm not unhappy about the experience though”
Reviews.Author: mhaghaed
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews of other people who had really bad experiences. I think the badness of the motel was exaggerated. I went there with my girlfriend while I was driving almost asleep. I should say, the location is really good, we found it while looking for another cheap hotel nearby! The guy at the check in was a polite boy and answered my questions with patience. The price was the lowest I had ever got for overnight stay. The room, I should say, was simply bad in terms of cleanliness. My girlfriend stayed awake the whole night because she thought the blankets were not washed(I fell asleep before she could suggest me to leave!). The bed was comfortable but probably not clean. But I'm the type of person who doesn't care that much. The next day, I took a shower in the bathroom. The shower was not as bad as the shower in our dorm.

Reviews.Title: “Bed stunk from excretement”
Reviews.Author: Mad_at_Dollar_Inn
Reviews.Content: The sheets stunk from a previous guest who did number 2 in the bed. It was extremely noticeable after I removed the covers.I gaged several times from it (into toilet).I refused to stay and they refused to refund even after I called the police. Later, when I tried to call a mgr..no one would return calls or answer phone. I wish I would have taken pictures because you could see it.

Reviews.Title: “Dont Go To The Dollar Inn !!!!!”
Reviews.Author: intelligent007
Reviews.Content: the room to this place was so dirty and the towels were dirty and it had a lot of roaches running around very nasty !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! iam going to go the the board of health about this place and get it shut down !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! dont go to a dollar inn if you are looking for a nice clean place to stay. i paid for roaches and dirt. I WANT MY MONEY BACK AND THEN SOME !!!

Reviews.Title: “Terrible service”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: When I made an attempt to rent a room at this hotel I was confronted by the desk clerk who laughed in my face because I thought the raising of prices at race time was just a little outrageous. The desk clerk was very rude and obnoxious. I was told that everybody raises their prices during the races and the advertised price of 29.95 a room per night would not be given. Instead the room charge was to be 40.00 a night. The customer prior to me was being treated very rudely when I arrived and she eventually refused to stay. After I received the same treatment I began to think that this was the normal for this particular hotel. Since I am a resident of the Indianapolis area I was disgusted to think that a company would treat customers in this fashion and blame it on the race. Want a good night's stay? Stay somewhere else!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Horrible.”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Dirty; non-functional smoke detectors, missing fire extinguishers. I observed a female I had never met before attempt to invite herself into my room. The "Family Friendly" review restriction does not allow any other discussion. Do not stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Worst Hotel in America”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Absolutely Terrible hotel! Our neighbors were walking around outside in their underwear with their clothes hanging over the banister. The sheets were bloody and when we tried to get another room they told us no refunds and gave us sheets with stains on them. We ended up sleeping over top a blanket stored in our car! Don't even let me start about the pee stained bathrooms and broken lights!

Reviews.Title: “Run, don't walk away from this hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Oh my, where to begin. We were driving through Indy and just to tired to keep going so we stopped at the next exit and got THE DOLLAR INN, I felt like norman bates was going to come out any minute. the clerk was busy chatting with friends (who were drinking out of a bottle covered in a brown bag...I kid you not.) We took our key and began walking to our room. Half the lights were burnt out on the side of the building. the door to our room was dirty, and looked like someone had tried to bash it in at some point. we opened the door and the over powering stench of urin and who knows what else hit us. turning on the light made everything ten times worse. I doubt they EVER clean. the beds had the covers pulled up but you could tell that someone had slept on them. the bathroom was so bad I'm not going to even get into it. Next door you could hear fighting and crying. Enough was enough...we left. bought coffee and continued on our way.

Reviews.Title: “They Should Charge by the Hour”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: So...I try to talk to the desk clerk through the scratched after hours pexiglas divider to no avail. He never even made eye contact, grunting only, "You use de phone?" before giving me my key. Granted 33 bucks isn't much, even though my debit card still shows a 50 dollar charge, but the "room" was a place from a bad porno movie. It stank of mold and vaguely of urine. Each of the working lights was about 20 yellow watts of sleazy atmosphere...but if they were brighter, I would've notice a lot more dirt, I imagine. The bed sagged, the toilet was dirty and ran constantly, the shower head was clogged with God knows what, there was no remote, no coffee maker, and no sign that the room had been cleaned in the last week. What a dump! And to top it off, if there had been an ice bucket, it would've cost 1.30 for a bag of ice. Never again. I will sleep in my car in a rest area first...at least there's coffee there. Dollar Inn on Michigan Road in Indianapolis is where junkies go to die.

Reviews.Title: “Loved the price”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: GREAT DEAL!!! I come to Indianapolis every year at least 8 times and I always stay at Dollar Inn. The rooms are big, all the cable channels I like, always near a good restaurant, and I´ve never had a problem once in all the years I´ve been staying there! I don´t know how these other people can complain.... the price is great and the accomodations are exactly what you need! Highly recommend the Michigan Rd. location near I-465! Especially during the race seasons!!!

Reviews.Title: “Trains right next to your room and they don't tell you.”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Checked in and not one word said----we were bone tired so moved into our room and went right to bed. There were over 12 trains that went through. It was so bad-------I couldn't believe it. I called the front desk after the first one went through and complained and the guy said only 2 or 3 more so we stayed rather than get dressed, repack the truck and look for another place to stay. No offer was ever made for us to get a refund. Awful! They shouldn't even be in business!

Reviews.Title: “The Good Value Dollar Inn”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Well if you are one who was raised in a mansion and you always stay at the five star hotels, then you should pass this one up. BUT, if you want to have a clean and safe place to stay for a reasonable price with down to earth, friendly people, fair prices and good service then allow me to recommemd this particular Dollar Inn as a place where you will have excellent accomodations at a reasoable price. So said the man who travels extensively by motor vehicle, was educated as an attorney and who now spends his time "giving evidence" for Why you can safely trust God and His Bible. I have stayed in this particular place three times in the last very few years.

Reviews.Title: “Way to go”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I work for dollar inn. yes we have had some problems. Whave corrected alot of them. Don't let one bad experience at one, that doesn't show for all. I'm not taking up for this motel, I know what it's been through. one bad employee after another. Not caring and then caring too much. Thanks for reading. CONCERNED EMPLOYYEE

HotelInfo.Name: Dollar Inn - Indianapolis
HotelInfo.Address: 6331 Crawfordsville Road, Indianapolis, IN 46224
